entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except west 50 gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
